frost.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: very cold weather, when water freezes
frost.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: the risk of frost damage to crops
Even in May we can sometimes get a late frost.
three continuous nights of hard frost
frost.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: ice that looks white and powdery and covers things that are outside when the temperature is very cold
frost.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The grass and trees were white with frost.
frost.translation[0].note_box[0].section: Many plants were damaged by the severe frost.
We’ve had three continuous nights of hard frost.
There had been a sharp frost overnight.
Scotland should have a dry night, with a touch of ground frost in northern glens.
I hoped the early frost wasn’t a sign of a bad winter to come.
There’s always the danger of a late frost killing the buds.
The lawn was covered in frost.
The plants need to be protected against frost.
Some crop regions may have suffered frost damage.
frost.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to cover a cake with a mixture of powdery sugar and liquid
